hippodrome.actions

Class Race

  • java.lang.Object
    • hippodrome.actions.Race

  • public class Race
extends java.lang.Object
    Representation of a race, which is done over a RacingTrack.
    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Hugo Fragata, Rui Lopes

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private int identification
      This race identification number.
      private int numberOfTracks
      The number of tracks this race will have in use.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Race(int numberOfTracks, int identification)
      Constructs a race with numberOfTracks number of tracks and identification identification.

      • Race

        public Race(int numberOfTracks,
            int identification)
        Constructs a race with numberOfTracks number of tracks and identification identification.

        identification - the race number identification.
